Reviews.Title: great phone!
Reviews.Author: B. Coleman
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone for my granddaughter last Christmas & we couldn't be more pleased with it! Sound reception is excellent! Absolutely no problems in 7 months.

Reviews.Title: I love my phone!
Reviews.Author: tavery25
Reviews.Content: I decided to go online and buy a cellphone to upgrade, and it is a really good phone for the price.  I have been with straight talk for a while, and it seems for me to be the best prepaid phone Compared to others I have tried in the past.  I have to be patient with the customer service because even though its not the best. It is getting better. I get the best phone clarity, and hardly any dropped calls if any.  I just got the phone activated yesterday.  I had to wait for sim card. I am more than happy with the phone.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic phone, back for another one
Reviews.Author: Betz "betzzz"
Reviews.Content: I love this phone. I purchased one about 2 1/2 years ago, refurbished, and have not had one bit of trouble with it.  Qwerty keyboard is fast, I never missed a call, never have I had trouble sending a call either.  I was able to get on the internet with no problems ever, and never, ever dropped a call. My son, and husband also own the t401g, and they are still going, and also have never had a problem with theirs, ( We all use Straight Talk Phone Service.)I am back to purchase another one, because I was on a boat, and ended up dropping it in the water...(long story.)  I would recommend this phone to anyone, and hopefully it will service you well, as it has for me.

Reviews.Title: It was a good and tough phone
Reviews.Author: jess "BB"
Reviews.Content: I had this phone for 14 months and Im the roughest with phones. Something isn't going my way it gets chuck unto the floor. It never gave me any problems. Its just after so many hits to the floor the screen protector keeps falling off soOoOoo time for a new phone cause I know Im going to loose it and that'll be it but this phone for me was great. Good for anyone that has to have a keyboard. I`ll miss my lil chubby phone lol

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!!
Reviews.Author: Donna Bernier "DMB"
Reviews.Content: Love this phone, it works GREAT, and I have awesome service and reception as well!  Easy to use, everything on this phone works great!  I have "NO" complaints about this phone at all! I'm actually going to purchase another one as a back up! Thank you Samsung!!

Reviews.Title: I love It.
Reviews.Author: James Malvin Woodard
Reviews.Content: It is a wonderful phone. I have not had any problems with it. I couldn't ask for a better phone.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Judy D
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my 10 year old niece!  She loves it and wouldn't want anything else....I was surprised since so many kids want the ipod and iphones!  She is very pleased with it; and since kids text so much....this provides the pull out keyboard and makes it great!

Reviews.Title: Loved this phone
Reviews.Author: kendra
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone cuz I love straight talk and the Samsung phones r great my 1st one I had for 4 yrs and sold it and it still works, I got this one cuz I wanted one to take Videos and it works  great. Product arrived on time and I would order from this person again

Reviews.Title: My crappy phone
Reviews.Author: Andy Cello Guy
Reviews.Content: I am from NH, this phone was sent to me from West Virginia. I have been getting calls from West Virginia on a semi-regularly basis since I got the phone !!over a year!! ago. The internet barely runs (not that I care about that, just letting everyone know) and I loose service EVERY TIME I talk on the phone. The camera is terrible, the voicemail sometimes doesn't work at all and the memory capacity isn't very good either. The only good thing I have to say about  this phone, is that It has pretty good battery life, and I drop it all the time usually on hard surfaces, and it still never fails.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: Callista
Reviews.Content: It is in very good shape!Like it was new. I would defiantly order from this person again! It came very fast in the mail also.Very Happy.

Reviews.Title: dont work
Reviews.Author: walter foulks
Reviews.Content: ordered this phone but after i got it it didnt work in my area .called and talked for over 8hrs to straight talk people and finally found out it is the phone that was wrong not the sim card .always check if they work in your area first before buying on here

Reviews.Title: Really disappointed
Reviews.Author: Dayna
Reviews.Content: This may be the worst cell phone I have ever owned. I had a 451c n it picked up service everywhere. I thought I was upgrading an do like the extras on this phone but it really doesn't mean anything when you can't receive service to talk on it. What would normally be a 5 minute conversation quickly becomes 15 minute one because of dropped calls. Just really disappointed.

ProductInfo.Features:
Affordable messaging phone with slide-out full QWERTY keyboard, Bluetooth, and 1.3-megapixel camera/camcorder
MP3 player; microSD memory expansion; hands-free speakerphone; 1000-contact phonebook; HTML web browser
Up to 5 hours of talk time, up to 360 hours (15 days) of standby time
Bulk Packaging - Includes Phone, Battery, Home Charger, SIM Card, Quick Start Guide
ProductInfo.Name: Straight Talk T401g Samsung Slide
